§ 4804. Notice and hearing During the period beginning on January 1, 1986, and ending 30 days after receipt of a proposal for an initial order submitted by any person affected by this chapter, the Secretary shall—(1) publish such proposed order; and
(2) give due notice of and opportunity for public comment on such proposed order.
(Pub. L. 99–198, title XVI, § 1615, Dec. 23, 1985, 99 Stat. 1609.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective DateSection effective Jan. 1, 1986, see section 1631 of Pub. L. 99–198, set out as a note under section 4801 of this title.
